On this page

# Type alias: SeriesOptions\<T\>

> **SeriesOptions**\<`T`\>: `T` &
> [`SeriesOptionsCommon`](../interfaces/SeriesOptionsCommon.html)

Represents the intersection of a series type `T`\'s options and common
series options.

## See[​](SeriesOptions.html#see "Direct link to See"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to See"} {#see .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

[SeriesOptionsCommon](../interfaces/SeriesOptionsCommon.html) for common
options.

• **T**
